content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Good morning! Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it, and I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Can you please provide me with an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mister Heine, I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can you please tell me your initial offer?

Also, can you please provide me with any additional information about the apartment and its location?
name: James Smith

content: Of course! My initial offer for the apartment is 800 euros per month. As for additional information, the apartment is located in a central area of the city, with easy access to public transportation and many amenities nearby. It is a cozy 25-square-meter studio apartment, with a balcony overlooking a quiet street.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mister Heine, I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a lower rental price. Can you please provide me with a lower offer?

Also, I would like to know if there are any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of?

Finally, I would like to know if there are any rules or restrictions on moving in and out of the apartment?

Thank you for your time and cooperation.

Do you agree to the price of 800 euros?
name: James Smith

content:
Thank you for your response. I understand that you are looking for a lower rental price, and I am willing to negotiate. Based on your request, my revised offer is 700 euros per month.

As for additional fees or charges, there is a one-time security deposit of 200 euros that will be due upon signing the lease agreement. This deposit will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled all your obligations under the agreement.

Regarding moving in and out of the apartment, there are no specific rules or restrictions. However, you will need to provide at least 30 days' notice if you wish to terminate the lease early.

I hope this information is helpful. Do you agree to the price of 700 euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine
